title.narrative: Deepening and Broadening Access to Financial Services in Mozambique

description.narrative: This activity (Deepening and Broadening Access to Financial Services in Mozambique) is a component of Deepening and Broadening Access to Financial Services in Mozambique reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £12,244,131. This component benefits Mozambique, and works in the following sector(s): Financial policy and administrative management, Formal sector financial intermediaries, Informal/semi-formal financial intermediaries, Education/training in banking and financial services. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Bank, DAI Europe. The start date is 10-08-2012 and the end date is 31-03-2020.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Education/training in banking and financial services
